tags: this is what happens when you take away the party's moral center
body:
In The Wake of C2E25

“Beauregard, hold him up.”

Wordlessly, Beau hoists the smirking thug up by his neck.

“The lot of you can piss off,” he hisses. “You don’t know who you’re fuckin’ with.”

Caleb peels off his gloves, face entirely blank. “When I was a young student,” he begins, “I fell in with an interesting crowd.”

He turns to face the bound slaver, smoke swirling in his palms. “I am not proud of the things I did. In fact I deeply regret the choices I made, extenuating circumstances aside.”

Flames crackle to life in his hands, hissing and spitting with arcane fury. “But I learned many valuable lessons.” He glances to Beau as if asking permission.

Beau tightens her headlock and nods to Caleb. “Do it.”

Their captive’s face has gone pale. Sweat drips down his filthy brow.

“L-look, I don’t-”

With the dull slap of flesh on flesh, Caleb grips the man’s face in his hands. Immediately, flesh begins to sear and melt. The slaver’s screams are shrill, but music to Caleb’s ears.

“You will tell me what I want to know,” he growls, digging his nails into the man’s slowly roasting skin. “Where. Did. You. Take. Them?”

Flames crackle to life in his hands, hissing and spitting with arcane fury. “But I learned many valuable lessons.” He glances to Beau as if asking permission.

Beau tightens her headlock and nods to Caleb. “Do it.”

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

I have other bologs too @degusart is my art blog and @magnusisbi is my TAZ fanart blog. more usless trivia: picies, bi tomcat, demi, infp/j, currently attending SAIC

tags: this is so important to me
summary: I just remembered that when Caleb asked Yasha for advice on traveling with a group among other things she told him to chew with...
body: I just remembered that when Caleb asked Yasha for advice on traveling with a group among other things she told him to chew with his mouth closed and wash his hands, what are the odds that these are things she picked up from that book of etiquette that Molly gave her and after reading those rules she actually really took them to heart

summary: “you know.” “i know.”  a kima/allura playlist. tracklist below the cut.[[MORE]] drove me wild // teagan and sara but you knew...
caption:
“you know.” “i know.”

a kima/allura playlist.

tracklist below the cut.

drove me wild // teagan and sara

but you knew that (you drove me wild) / and you wouldn’t let me lose control

easily // grimes

never better, just less immediate / you come and go, but i love you so

tell her you love her // echosmith

you tell her clearly / speak what your heart wants you to

speeding cars // imogen heap

now, now, darling, oh don’t lose your head / cause none of us were angels and you know i love you, yeah

the lightning strike (what if this storm ends) // snow patrol

the perfect halo of gold hair and lightning / sets you off against the planet’s last dance

stay alive // jose gonzalez

i will stay with you tonight / hold you close til the morning light

always gold (album version) // radical face

all my life i’ve never known where you’ve been / there were holes in you, the kind that i could not mend

winter song // sara bareilles, ingrid michaelson

cause you’re not where you belong / inside my arms

when you sleep // mary lambert

you politely asked to take a walk with me / i would’ve married you there underneath the trees

let her go // jasmine thompson

well you see her when you fall asleep / but never to touch and never to keep

when she loved me // sarah mclachlan

still i waited for the day / when she’d say “i will always love you”

where are you now? // the audreys

are you in some bar, drinking for two? / i’m sorry baby if it was all too much for you

storm song // phildel

i’ll send a storm to capture your heart to bring you home

in this shirt // the irrepressibles

of you and me ever changing / moving on now, moving fast

hello // adele

there’s such a difference between us / and a million miles

i need my girl // the national

i’m under the gun again / i know i was the 45% event / i know i was a lot of things

lovers’ eyes // mumford & sons

tame the ghosts in my head / that run wild and wish me dead

it’s only time // the magnetic fields 

what could stop this beating heart once it’s made a vow? / it’s only time, it’s only time

you already loved me // rachel portman

instrumental

in our bedroom after the war // stars

all the living are dead and the dead are all living / the war is over and we are beginning

still into you // michael castro, jackie castro

let ‘em wonder how we got this far / cause i don’t really need to wonder at all

what could stop this beating heart once it’s made a vow? / it’s only time, it’s only time

instrumental

all the living are dead and the dead are all living / the war is over and we are beginning

let ‘em wonder how we got this far / cause i don’t really need to wonder at all
